dashboard:
dashboard theme="dark">SDA Windows Servers via WinLogBeat
Total Windows Server's On-Boarded
| inputlookup CMCS_WIN_SERVER_HOST.csv | stats dc(FQDN) -24h@h now 1 anone progressbar
Received Logs Last 48 Hours
| metadata type=hosts index=sec_cmcs_win_server | eval current=now() | eval lastHour=relative_time(now(),"-48h") | where lastHour < recentTime | lookup CMCS_WIN_SERVER_HOST.csv FQDN AS host | rename "Host_Type" as match | fillnull match value=New_Windows_Server | search match=Windows_Server | table host | stats dc(host) -30d@d now 1
value none none 0 ["0x53a051","0x0877a6","0xf8be34","0xf1813f","0xdc4e41"] [0,30,70,100] preview 1 1 0 1 medium standard absolute DC's Sending Logs after 0 1
Haven't Received Logs in Over 48 Hours
| metadata type=hosts index=sec_cmcs_win_server | eval current=now() | eval lastHour=relative_time(now(),"-48h") | where lastHour > recentTime | lookup CMCS_WIN_SERVER_HOST.csv FQDN AS host | rename "Host_Type" as match | fillnull match value=New_Windows_Server | search match=Windows_Server | table host | stats dc(host) -30d@d now 1
none ["0x53a051","0x0877a6","0xf8be34","0xf1813f","0xdc4e41"] progressbar
Windows Server's Haven't Reported in
| metadata type=hosts index=sec_cmcs_win_server | lookup CMCS_WIN_SERVER_HOST.csv FQDN AS host | rename "Host_Type" as match | fillnull match value=New_Windows_Server | search match!=New_Windows_Server | eval isReporting=1 | append [| inputlookup CMCS_WIN_SERVER_HOST.csv | eval isReporting=2 ] | eval FQDN=coalesce(FQDN,host) | stats count(isReporting) by FQDN | rename count(isReporting) AS count | where count=1 | table FQDN | stats DC(FQDN) -30d@d now 1
none progressbar
Unknown Windows Server's Sending Logs
| metadata type=hosts index=sec_cmcs_win_server | eval current=now() | eval lastHour=relative_time(now(),"-30d") | lookup CMCS_WIN_SERVER_HOST.csv FQDN AS host | rename "Host_Type" as match | fillnull match value=New_Windows_Server | search match=New_Windows_Server | table host | stats DC(host) -24h@h now 1
none progressbar
Hosts Reporting in by Name
| metadata type=hosts index=sec_cmcs_win_server | eval current=now() | eval lastHour=relative_time(now(),"-14d") | where lastHour < recentTime | rename totalCount as Count firstTime as "First Event" lastTime as "Last Event" recentTime as "Last Update" | fieldformat Count=tostring(Count, "commas") | fieldformat "First Event"=strftime('First Event', "%c") | fieldformat "Last Event"=strftime('Last Event', "%c") | fieldformat "Last Update"=strftime('Last Update', "%c") | fields host "First Event" "Last Update" Count | sort - "Count" -30d@d now 1
20 none none false progressbar false false true
